content: I'll start by joining some Goodreads groups dedicated to Michael Connelly and legal thrillers. I'll also check out the Michael Connelly Fans Facebook group to see what discussions are happening there. Do you think I should create a post introducing myself and mentioning that I just finished reading the latest bestseller by John Grisham and attended a meetup organized by a group last week, where we discussed the book? That way, I can connect with other readers who might have similar interests.
